@@ -332,0 +332,5 @@ + /** + * Returns symbol information (possibly cached) for a given package. + * + *

This remains usable after the index is closed. + */ @@ -336,0 +341,7 @@ + /** + * Returns package information (possibly cached) for the given directory. + * + *

When this index is closed its file system, and any {@link Path paths} + * derived from it, will become unusable. This includes paths inside this + * entry. + */ @@ -340,0 +352,6 @@ + /** + * Whether the given {@link FileObject file} belongs to this index. + * + *
